hero.description: I am a Junior Frontend Developer who creates modern and user-friendly websites. I bring ideas to life through code and constantly strive to learn and improve.

about.title: About Me

projects.title: Featured Projects

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
